com.software.reuze

Interface aa_i_Agent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    aa_i_EnvironmentObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    aa_a_Agent, aa_a_AgentReinforcement, aa_a_SimpleProblemSolving, aa_AgentDFSOnline, aa_AgentLRTAStar, aa_AgentMock, aa_AgentSearch, aa_SimpleProblemSolvingMap

    public interface aa_i_Agent
extends aa_i_EnvironmentObject
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): Figure 2.1, page 35.
    Figure 2.1 Agents interact with environments through sensors and actuators.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      aa_i_Action execute(aa_i_Percept percept)
      Call the Agent's program, which maps any given percept sequences to an action.
      boolean isAlive()
      Life-cycle indicator as to the liveness of an Agent.
      void setAlive(boolean alive)
      Set the current liveness of the Agent.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        aa_i_Action execute(aa_i_Percept percept)
        Call the Agent's program, which maps any given percept sequences to an action.
        Parameters:
        percept - The current percept of a sequence perceived by the Agent.
        Returns:
        the Action to be taken in response to the currently perceived percept.

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Life-cycle indicator as to the liveness of an Agent.
        Returns:
        true if the Agent is to be considered alive, false otherwise.

      • setAlive

        void setAlive(boolean alive)
        Set the current liveness of the Agent.
        Parameters:
        alive - set to true if the Agent is to be considered alive, false otherwise.
